com.msgilligan.bitcoinj.money

Class BaseXChangeExchangeRateProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javamoney.moneta.spi.base.BaseExchangeRateProvider
      • com.msgilligan.bitcoinj.money.BaseXChangeExchangeRateProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObservableExchangeRateProvider, javax.money.convert.ExchangeRateProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BitfinexXChangeRateProvider, CoinbaseXChangeRateProvider, DynamicXChangeRateProvider, ItBitXChangeRateProvider

    public abstract class BaseXChangeExchangeRateProvider
extends org.javamoney.moneta.spi.base.BaseExchangeRateProvider
implements ObservableExchangeRateProvider

    Base ExchangeRateProvider using XChange library Currently supports current DEFERRED rates only
